Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Grand/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Grand/Milwaukee due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Grand/Milwaukee due to a door problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include these buses and rail Lines:

  • #22 Clark
  • Brown, Green, Orange and Pink Line trains

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
